Name: Real Orchestra
About the game: 'A gaming experience for aspiring conductors.' Real Orchestra is a life-like experience as a orchestra conductor. Become a conductor for a symphony orchestra and conduct the famous classical tunes. Use your hand to hit the notes as they fly at you. Master the pace of the music in practice mode. The music changes in pace and volume in accordance with your directions.
